titleStmt.title: A Common-Councell holden the first day of May 1660 ordered by this court that the Kings Majesties letter and declaration directed to this court, & now read, be forthwith printed & published, [countersigned] Sadler.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Aleyn Mayor.
Contains 2 letters from Charles II concerning his magnanimity towards the nation and his lack of vindictiveness regarding recovery of lost property.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
